recipe.title: Rosy Peach & Ripe Melon Sangria
ingredients: 8 peeled, diced (1/4 inch) ripe white or golden peaches
2 bottles rosé or dry white wine
instructions: 1. Place all the fruit in a large pitcher. Pour in wine, juice and Cointreau. Let rest at room temperature for 1 to 2 hours to blend flavors.
2. Before serving, add the sparkling water. Serve in wine glasses over ice and garnish with mint.
